attributes.action: Stop giving our money to Africa and all the other countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are being robbed. All our past and present governments keep giving the peoples money away to all these countries who haven't progressed at all. They still sit on their haunches and breed.Why shouldn't they when we keep giving them more money. Yet we the British tax payer are having all our services quashed.Health,Education and the State pension etc. Although there is still enough money for the MP's to have their pensions.But we the working people pay more taxes there are new ones every year.
